content: I’m sure you still have a lot of conflicting emotions about publishing this very touching story. I’m presuming you don’t live near his prison, but maybe you can be his SPEAKER at least one more time. I go into prison and work with guys who, often after many years, finally begin to take a deep look inward. Some do. Some can’t. But the fact that he went to certain lengths to try to prove to you he was getting clean, was something, even if it seems like a slender thread.
